content: Hi All, does anyone have any other directions for building mathlib 4? I'm in VS Code in Windows with Lean 4 installed, but the directions in https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4#build-instructions don't seem to work there.
Actually this makes a lot more sense in conjunction with the 'Installing Lean and mathlib on Windows' directions: https://leanprover-community.github.io/install/windows.html
